item.title: Coffee Point of Sale
item.dc:creator: Brent Lagerman
item.description:
coffeepointofsale.com is an online resource for– you guessed it, coffee POS systems! It’s actually a big business with a wealth of industry news. Business Machines (BMI) hired us to create a portal site to let them create articles, and collect resources from around the web into one central location. The site helped them become one […]

The post Coffee Point of Sale appeared first on mimoYmima.
item.content:encoded:
coffeepointofsale.com is an online resource for– you guessed it, coffee POS systems! It’s actually a big business with a wealth of industry news. Business Machines (BMI) hired us to create a portal site to let them create articles, and collect resources from around the web into one central location. The site helped them become one of the industry leaders in Coffee POS systems.

The post Coffee Point of Sale appeared first on mimoYmima.

item.title: BMI-POS
